abilityEffect: Once during your turn, when you play Cradily from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for up to 3 in any combination of Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards. Show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
